page.title: 19The Game Keeper 3
page.content:
There are also some poachers and last year some of them dressed up as frog men and speared the salmon that were in the dam. They were caught and convicted. There are fewer keepers now because there is less demand for them. Only a few Estates can afford keepers or to take on apprentices. Some young people that want to be a game keeper go to the forestry departmet to get a job as a ranger. One man can do the work of three men with the help of an Argocat (a vehicle for travelling over rough ground) to carry the animals.
*************
